name: Paint Fire Hit: Color Bounce
description:
Do some good job and paint tower on your color car in our 3D painting simulator. Make a paint hit from your color car, which is flying in a space. Make a color hit to every ring of paint tower. Make sure that you will not paint hit the obstacles, which are laying on the rings. So make sure that your color car has not touched any obstacles on the rings of paint tower. Do a good job, and color hit every tower of rings in our new 3D painting simulator. Complete every level of our new 3D painting simulator and show everyone that your color car is the best in paint hit competitions. Download our new free simulator: Paint Fire Hit: Color Bounce and do some good job.

In this 3D painting simulator, your main target is to paint hit every ring of paint tower on your color car. One level has one paint tower, which consists of some rings. Color hit every ring, but be careful, if your color car will paint hit an obstacle, which are laying on the rings of the tower. Make a color hit to fill the rings of paint tower. Be careful not to hit the obstacles. Tap to make a paint hit and time your action, target carefully, enjoy the beautiful art style and casual, simple gameplay. Do a good job in this 3D painting simulator and complete every level of the game. Paint hit every ring from your color car and show everyone that you are the master in this simulator.

Paint Fire Hit: Color Bounce is a free to play 3D painting simulator. Do some good job and color hit every tower in our game. Evade every obstacle, which are laying on the rings of paint tower. Use your color car to paint hit every ring on the level and go ahead to the next level. Complete every level of this 3D painting simulator and color hit every paint tower to show everyone that you are the boss of this game. Share this 3D painting simulator with your friends and start competition of the color cars. Find out who will earn more points and will paint hit no obstacles. Download our free 3D painting simulator and start your journey. Do some good job and paint towers of our simulator, they do really need it!
